response.original_title: VeggieTales: Little Ones Can Do Big Things Too!
response.overview: Inspired by a classic VeggieTales favorite song, "Little Guys Can Do Big Things Too," this new release shows kids that even though they are small, they can be used by God to do BIG things! Featuring all new countertop animation with show intros from Bob, Larry and Junior, this fun compilation has a lot of new twists! ALSO features the popular Veggie kids (real kids' voices animated with little veggies) giving their thoughts on everything from how big God is to how little they sometimes feel! Includes popular shows. Dave and the Giant Pickle, Pistachio: The Little Boy Who Woodn't, and Lyle the Kindly Viking. Also includes 3 Great Silly Songs! Includes 10 minutes of BRAND NEW animation.
response.title: VeggieTales: Little Ones Can Do Big Things Too!
